summary: A GDB Python extension that adds full-featured Cython debugging support, providing commands for setting breakpoints, stepping through code, inspecting locals and globals, evaluating expressions, navigating the mixed Python/Cython/C stack, and displaying source with optional syntax coloring.
business_intent: Allow developers to efficiently debug Cython-compiled modules inside GDB, bridging the gap between Python and native code to reduce troubleshooting time and improve reliability of mixed-language applications.
